about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Learn more about who we are and how this campaign will transform lives.

faqs.a: Rotary San Cristobal is a local Rotary club committed to service and community development. We work on health, education, and welfare projects, coordinating efforts with public and private institutions to generate a positive and sustainable impact.

faqs.q: What is the Dr. Pablo Puky Rotary Medical Center Foundation?
faqs.a: The Dr. Pablo Puky Rotary Medical Center Foundation is a non-profit organization dedicated to providing quality medical care and prevention programs to the people and families who need it most. This campaign seeks to strengthen its equipment and infrastructure to improve care.

faqs.q: How will the funds raised be used?
faqs.a: Funds will be used for the acquisition and renovation of priority medical equipment and improvements in the center's care capacity. We will publish progress and results to ensure transparency at every stage.

You can make your contribution from the Donate page, choosing the amount you prefer. Every contribution, large or small, brings us closer to the goal and has a direct impact on community medical care.

centro-medico.title: Dr. Pablo Puky Rotary Medical Center Foundation
centro-medico.description: For more than 30 years, we have been the health refuge for 27,000 Tachira residents a year. Today, we need your help to renew our equipment and unlock an international grant that will multiply your impact.
centro-medico.long_description:
Imagine the distress of a mother who needs an urgent ultrasound for her baby, or a grandfather who requires an immediate heart check-up but lacks the resources for a private clinic. For more than 30 years, the Dr. Pablo Puky Medical Center has been the answer for them.

We have served more than 27,000 people each year, becoming a pillar of health for the most vulnerable communities in San Cristobal and all over Tachira. But today, our heroes in white coats need better tools to keep fighting.

The Challenge: Our equipment has given all it had. To guarantee accurate diagnoses and save lives, we need an urgent Comprehensive Renovation.

What will we achieve with your contribution?

Your donation will go directly to the acquisition of state-of-the-art technology:

  • Maternal Health: A new high-resolution Aplio Flex Ultrasound to care for mothers and their babies from the first heartbeat.
  • Fight against Cancer: Digitalization of X-rays and a modern Mammogram for early detection of breast cancer.
  • Heart Care: Digital Holters and electrocardiographs to prevent heart attacks and arrhythmias in time.
  • Accurate Diagnoses: Complete modernization of the clinical laboratory.

Your money is worth x10: The Magic of Rotary

This is where your generosity makes history. We are applying for a Global Grant from Rotary International. We need to raise an initial local goal (10% of the total project) to unlock international funds from the World and District Fund.

This means that every dollar you donate today is multiplied to bring equipment valued at more than $80,000 to Tachira. You are not just donating money; you are investing in the health of more than 100,000 people and ensuring the center's service for the next 15 years.

Help us reach the goal. Help us keep saying: "We are here for you".

gym-rehabilitacion.title: Active Rehabilitation Center "Life in Motion"
gym-rehabilitacion.description: Old age should not be synonymous with loneliness or dependence. We are creating the first clinical space in Tachira scientifically designed to restore strength, balance, and joy to our seniors.
gym-rehabilitacion.long_description:
Aging brings two silent enemies: loss of strength (sarcopenia) and loneliness. Many of our seniors suffer preventable falls that end in hip fractures, marking the end of their independence.

We want to break that cycle. At the Dr. Pablo Puky Medical Center, we are creating the "Life in Motion" program. Forget the idea of a noisy gym; this is a Clinical Sanctuary supervised by experts.

A Comprehensive 100m¬≤ Space

Your contribution will equip 5 Specialized Therapeutic Zones:

  • Zone 1 - Mobility: To reduce stiffness and prepare the body.
  • Zone 2 - Strength: Combats muscle loss so they regain autonomy.
  • Zone 3 - Balance and Gait: Vital technology to prevent falls and fractures.
  • Zone 4 - Coordination: Exercises to reconnect the mind with movement.
  • Zone 5 - Psychosocial: Therapy tables to combat isolation and create friendship.

The Impact: We have the space and the expert human team, but we lack specialized equipment (bars, non-slip floors, walking implements). Your donation turns an empty space into a pioneering center in Tachira.

Help us demonstrate that aging can be done with dignity. Help us put movement into their years.
